/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway is teeming with cars and trucks, indicating a busy time of day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, a common sight in urban landscapes. On the right side of the road, there's a large billboard, adding to the urban feel of the image. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the overcast sky and the greenery lining the road.
